description: Bringing outdoor functionality and comfort to the everyday, the Mountain T-Shirt is an ideal partner for everything from casual hikes to fun days at the gym. Made with recycled polyester and organically grown cotton, this soft and breathable tee dries quickly and wicks moisture, keeping you cool and dry on hot and humid days. A casual fit, raglan sleeves and mountain print bring together a classic silhouette that performs when you need it to.
name: Mammut Mountain T-Shirt Trilogy - Mens

specs.value: Drirelease recycled polyester organic cotton knit
enhanced wicking, drying, and comfort with natural and synthetic fibers
